ygData.subject: GMs
ygData.msgSnippet: what are you doing when you go to the servers to see if a gm is on? are you just doing /who all gm because if you are you are probably missing out on some of
ygData.messageBody:
what are you doing when you go to the servers to see if a gm is on? are
you just doing /who all gm because if you are you are probably missing
out on some of the gms for they can toggle the gm on and off just like
we can toggle on and off role play, so i would suggest either
a) scedule a couple of days where you play only on one server during
their buissness hours and /petition and some one will get to you
or

b) do as some one else suggested on this list and just let us know when
you are going on (do your best to predict) and we petition for it and
when we get a gms attention we tell them that you are on another server
adn we will get you real quick
